                        <script>jQuery(document).ready(function () {
                                if (jQuery("body")) { var tab_carousel_1 = $("body .top-featured-3fb8b834-1566-4897-81c8-257fe60b07b7"); jQuery(tab_carousel_1).owlCarousel({ items: 7, autoPlay: !1, stopOnHover: !1, loop: !1, responsive: { 100: { items: 1 }, 319: { items: 2 }, 751: { items: 3 }, 992: { items: 4 }, 1200: { items: 4 }, 1400: { items: 5 }, 1600: { items: 7 } }, nav: !0, dots: !1 }) } else { var tab_carousel = $("body:not .top-featured-3fb8b834-1566-4897-81c8-257fe60b07b7"); jQuery(tab_carousel).owlCarousel({ items: 7, autoPlay: !1, stopOnHover: !1, loop: !1, responsive: { 100: { items: 1 }, 319: { items: 2 }, 751: { items: 3 }, 992: { items: 4 }, 1300: { items: 4 }, 1500: { items: 5 }, 1600: { items: 7 } }, nav: !0, dots: !1 }) }
                                jQuery(".top-featured-nav .next").click(function () { jQuery(".top-featured-3fb8b834-1566-4897-81c8-257fe60b07b7").trigger('next.owl') }); jQuery(".top-featured-nav .prev").click(function () { jQuery(".top-featured-3fb8b834-1566-4897-81c8-257fe60b07b7").trigger('prev.owl') })
                            }); jQuery(window).load(function () { if (jQuery(".top-featured-wrap").find('.owl-nav').hasClass('disabled')) { jQuery(".top-featured-nav").hide() } else { jQuery(".top-featured-nav").show() } }); jQuery(window).resize(function () { if (jQuery(".top-featured-wrap").find('.owl-nav').hasClass('disabled')) { jQuery(".top-featured-nav").hide() } else { jQuery(".top-featured-nav").show() } })

                                            color: #ffffff;
                                        }

                                            color: #ffba00;
                                        }

    <script>var blogowlrtl = $("body.rtl .grid-blog-slider"); $("body.rtl .grid-blog-slider").owlCarousel({ items: 5, loop: !1, rewind: false, nav: !0, rtl: !0, dots: !1, responsive: { 100: { items: 1 }, 543: { items: 2 }, 1200: { items: 3 }, 1600: { items: 5 } } }); var blogowl = $("body:not(.rtl) .grid-blog-slider"); $("body:not(.rtl) .grid-blog-slider").owlCarousel({ items: 3, loop: !1, nav: !0, rtl: !1, dots: !1, rewind: false, responsive: { 100: { items: 1 }, 543: { items: 2 }, 1200: { items: 3 }, 1600: { items: 5 } } }); $('.grid--blog').each(function () { if ($(this).find('.owl-nav').hasClass('disabled')) { $(this).find('.customNavigation').hide() } else { $(this).find('.customNavigation').show() } }); $(".blog_next").click(function () { $(".grid-blog-slider").trigger('next.owl') }); $(".blog_prev").click(function () { $(".grid-blog-slider").trigger('prev.owl') });</script>
